Title: Prohibits the manufacture, distribution and sale of toys and child care products containing phthalates
Summary: Prohibits the manufacture, distribution and sale of certain toys and child care products containing phthalates; imposes a civil fine of not less than $10,000 a day for violation of such provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง397-c, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the manufacture, distribution and sale of toys and child care products containing phthalates
